kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
I've been using the Migration Toolkit since it was in beta. We use it in our projects at BizStream. It is powerful and saves time, but yes it is not an easy button. I can back up what Mike is saying above. In fact, take heed of the points he made, they are great! \ \ I think being aware the migration settings, the mappings, and the extensions is important to getting the most out of the Migration Toolkit.
We have had to drop back to custom import processes here and there, but we strive to use the Migration Toolkit as much as possible.
